import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {genreids} from "./MovieList" const MovieFavourites=()=> { const [favourites,setfavourite]=useState([]) useEffect(()=> { const favouritesData= JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("favourites") || "[]"); const genres=favouritesData.map(data=>data) setfavourite((favouritesData)) },[]) console.log(favourites) return (

Favourites Movie

{ favourites.map((favourite)=> ( )) }
Image Title Genre popularity Rating Action
{favourite.title} { genreids [favourite.genre_ids[0]]} {favourite.popularity} {favourite.vote_average}
) } export default MovieFavourites;
